Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Agent, Query

    public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Messages are sent between nodes. Message is an abstract class. A Message knows how many time steps/jumps it has travelled. A Message knows it's TTL and it has an array with id's of recent visited Nodes.
